entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
